summary: Implements a Flask‑based REST service that maintains a Faiss vector index for on‑the‑fly retrieval of token chunks. It stores chunk token sequences in memory, supports adding new document chunks, querying nearest‑neighbor tokens, and resetting the index, allowing dynamic updates to the retrieval system at runtime.
business_intent: Provide an API for real‑time, scalable semantic search over tokenized text, enabling downstream NLP applications to query and augment the retrieval index without downtime.
